intro.title: Pleased to meet you!
intro.description: We are a group of Barcelona engineers committed to addressing the challenge of water drought in the city. We want to maximize the potential of new technologies to provide urban residents with detailed, actionable, and personalized data to help them optimize their water consumption.

development.title: For now, we're in development phase...
development.status: Currently, we're in the midst of project development, and with potential support from a Barcelona City Council grant, we're working intensively to make it a reality.
development.collaboration: We know that with your help, we can achieve it! We're looking for strategic partners, associated plumbers for sensor installation, and committed beta users.

home.title: Save Water Intelligently
home.description: Discover how to save water with MICA, the intelligent monitoring system that helps you reduce consumption and detect leaks in real-time. Sustainability for Barcelona.

hero.title: The new way to save water
hero.text: We empower Barcelona to conserve water with artificial intelligence-powered sensors.

video.title: Small Steps. Big Impact
video.text: Track water usage and save in real time. Through a single-point sensor and a custom app, take control of your water bills and cultivate more sustainable habits.

benefit1.title: Discover how you use water
benefit1.text: Monitor real-time water consumption, identify which devices consume the most, and compare yourself against the average or recommended limits.

benefit2.title: Detect leaks instantly
benefit2.text: MICA automatically detects any water leaks and notifies you with an alert to prevent significant damage and water bill surprises.

benefit3.title: Receive recommendations
benefit3.text: Get personalized and actionable tips in real time to save water and money.

problem.title: Did you know...
problem.text: A study states that 82% of water consumption in our homes comes from just 3 devices: the shower, toilet, and faucet.
problem.info: Do you know which devices consume the most water in your home?

product.title: Water Monitoring System
product.description: Explore the technology behind MICA: an IoT sensor and AI that analyzes your water consumption, detects leaks, and provides detailed reports to optimize water usage.

step1.title: A single-point sensor at the water meter captures precise data
step1.text: The sensor is easily and quickly installed on the home's water inlet pipe. Powered by long-lasting batteries, it captures precise water flow data and sends it to the cloud in real-time using Internet of Things (IoT) technologies.

step2.title: AI algorithms break down consumption by device
step2.text: A cloud-based data platform powered by artificial intelligence algorithms breaks down consumption by device, generates personalized recommendations, and detects leaks. This is achieved through sensor calibration and the analysis of statistical consumption behaviors.

step3.title: Our app displays your usage data and creates a personalized plan
step3.text: Through their smartphone, the user monitors their consumption data by device, receives personalized tips and leak alerts, views savings, earns incentives, and compares their usage with the average or the recommended limits. They can also provide feedback to the AI algorithm. This helps them optimise their water consumption and adopt more sustainable practices.

beta.title: Beta Program for Water Saving
beta.description: Be among the first to try MICA! Register for our beta program and get a free smart sensor to control and optimize your water consumption.

hero.title: Join the beta program!
hero.text: We are in the midst of prototyping and certifying the MICA system. With the support of the Barcelona City Council, we will subsidize the installation of the system in a hundred pilot homes in the city during 2025. Your participation in this phase will help us perfect and validate the system.

benefit1.title: Pioneer Technology
benefit1.text: Join us in co-creating an innovative, AI-powered solution for water conservation.

benefit2.title: Immediate Savings
benefit2.text: Track your water consumption and receive personalized recommendations from day one.

benefit3.title: Collective Impact
benefit3.text: Be part of a community committed to sustainability.

benefit4.title: Exclusive Offer

step4.title: Start saving with MICA

cta.text: Join MICA's beta program today and start making a difference in your home's and the city's water consumption.

about.title: Innovation in Water Saving
about.description: Meet the team behind MICA and our mission to combat drought in Barcelona through innovative technology and intelligent solutions for water saving.

history.title: Our history
history.subtitle: Innovating to combat drought in Barcelona
history.paragraph1: In the summer of 2022, Barcelona suffered one of the worst droughts in its history. While the city entered drought alert status, a group of local engineers had a revolutionary idea.
history.paragraph2: Thus MICA was born, a non profit organization with the mission of transforming how we understand and conserve water. Our technology allows Barcelona residents to face each new water crisis with precise data and innovative tools.

hero.title: The only cookies we use... <orange>are for eating!</orange>
hero.description: Welcome to cookies.mica.eco, a creative and solidarity project linked to MICA ECO association, which promotes sustainable water management and environmental awareness.

faq1.question: What do you offer?
faq1.answer: We offer artisanal and customized cookies for gifts, companies and events. Each cookie is unique, carefully decorated and designed to be enjoyed on special occasions.

faq2.question: Where do the profits go?
faq2.answer: The profits from the sale of our cookies go entirely to the association. Thanks to our app, MICA ECO users will be able to convert points earned from water savings into donations to the NGOs that inspire them the most.

faq3.question: Do you use cookies?
faq3.answer: MICA ECO's privacy policy ensures that we don't use digital cookies to track you. Instead, the only cookies you'll find are the ones you can taste!
